transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Sir, good evening. I am speaking from IndiaMART.
Customer: Sollunga madam.
Executive: So, sir, we have Madhavan calling you. Basically, you have given an attempt. Like feedback is due, sir. I think that's why the call didn't go through. How is it going for us, sir? Right now, based on our service, is there any support needed from our end? I am asking because you have given a feedback.
Customer: No, we didn't ask for any support. But it was shown that a call was made, but no one called. That's why.
Executive: Yeah, yes sir. That's what I mentioned. So I have to clear that sir. We are looking into it. But beyond that, if you still need any solution, we have to support you, right? That's why I have called. So our
Customer: Sollunga.
Executive: Okay. Sir, at our level, you are doing all the products, we have verified it. Totally you are doing 47 products.
Customer: [Unintelligible]
Executive: Sollunga madam.
Executive: Yes sir. So our usage level is low. If you improve it, whether you get business through it or not, you have a chance to receive a potential client through direct call, direct inquiries, sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: So that's why I have called. Because if you use it well, for example, in your product, soap bags and pouch bags
Customer: Right now, sir?
Customer: Madam, call me tomorrow madam. I am a little busy in the factory.
Executive: Sir, I am informing you that I will close the query with your confirmation. Okay, okay. Sir, any call feedback will be received by you right now. But I will give you guidance on what to do to make it better for you. Call me tomorrow at 11:00 am.
Executive: Yeah, okay sir. I will call you sir. Please update this a little bit. Thank you sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says no one called from IndiaMART.

- Wants to close the feedback query.

- Customer is busy in the factory.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed to close the feedback query.

- Executive offered guidance to improve business.

- Executive agreed to call the customer next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day at 11:00 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, call, business, support
